name: CLNI 70
title: Colleges Nine and Ten Community Garden
description: Students in this course design and build a new community garden at Colleges Nine and Ten. Students engage in a collaborative design process with campus stakeholders; learn hands-on skills and community gardening best practices; and build regenerative social and ecological systems. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to College Nine and John R. Lewis College students

class_notes: Class meets at the College Nine & John R. Lewis College Garden.
